TopicTitle: I want to make start a carrier mode with out science grinding unlock all parts bye doing alt+f12

Articles.Content:
I want to make start a carrier mode with out science grinding unlock all parts bye doing alt+f12

When I go to the TechTree menu and click alt+f12 to go to the debug menu and click the R&D tab and click the options Unlock All Nodes and Research All parts then click Save Tree.It unlocks all of the tree but when I exit the Tech tree window and reenter that Tech tree menu it dos not unlock all of the Tech tree it has start unlocked but not all of the Tech tree nodes.Any help would be appreciated.Thanks for helping.This is on a Windows machine.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-04T16:20:55Z" title="08/04/2015 04:20  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 4, 2015</time> by Cloakedwand72**

You should use the [Tree Toppler](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/739/Tree%20Toppler) mod. I get the same effect in the F12 menu, which is kind of disappointing.

> 
> This is on a Windows machine.

Maybe you should change the subject category, but I'm on a Mac so it's probably system-neutral.

Moving to gameplay questions, it's not really a support issue, just hold down the modifier key when the debug screen is open, add sci points and buy the nodes.

Or start a new game and use the sliders to increase your starting sci points.
